message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to you. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you its worth is no less than $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. Consider it carefully, and let me know your decision.
